name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebGPT - ChatGPT for Webpages, Free AI Copilot by ChatGPT-4

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebGPT is an all-in-one AI assistant equipped with the most advanced AI models to help you Chat, Write and more from webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate browsing companion: our Chrome extension puts the power of ChatGPT at your fingertips, revolutionizing your web experience! WebGPT is a powerful browser extension that allows users to connect with the developer and unlock the capabilities of ChatGPT on any webpage. The extension enhances browsing experience by enabling users to ask questions about the current page or request a summary of its content.

Features
1. Chat with Website: Users can ask questions to blogs, articles, or news with WebGPT.
2. Summarize Content: The extension can summarize webpages, PDFs, documents, DOCX files, and more.
3. Rewrite Post with WebGPT
4. Translate with WebGPT
5. Fix Grammar with WebGPT
6. Generate Twitter Post from a webpage
6. Generate Facebook and Linkedin Post from a webpage
